thread.title: An Aha Chart: Using Nostalgia to Teach Clients About Inflation
thread.title_full: An Aha Chart: Using Nostalgia to Teach Clients About Inflation - WSJ

author: Anna Prior
title: An Aha Chart: Using Nostalgia to Teach Clients About Inflation
text:
This is an occasional feature in which an adviser shares a chart or other visual presentation that he or she finds valuable to help clients grasp an aspect of personal finance or investing.
The adviser: Ara Oghoorian, founder and president of ACap Asset Management Inc., Encino, Calif.
The chart: A table from the “Remember When...A Nostalgic Look Back in Time” series of booklets from Seek Publishing Inc. of Birmingham,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
